name: Graduated from Hell
description:
So in this game the movement is jumble so as to represent the fact that textbook knowledge does confuse students while practical one helps them grow and understand better.

So presssing D will take you right instead of left.

What do you think is a students Hell?

Yes, you guessed it right studying, but is the studying helping. lets see in this game you will be taught certain thing practically but then you are going to be sent to hell where you will most certainly be made to forget the things as you didn't do it using the hell masters method.
